name: dub-link-shortener
title: Dub
description: Dub is the open-source link management platform for modern marketing teams. This extension allows you to shorten and retrieve your Dub links directly inside Raycast.
author: quuu

commands.name: shorten-link
commands.title: Shorten Link
commands.description: Shorten links from arguments, clipboard or selection with dub.co using workspaces, custom domains, tags etc.

commands.name: search-links
commands.title: Search Links
commands.description: Search shortened links with dub.co in different workspaces

preferences.name: workspaceApiKey
preferences.title: Workspace API Key
preferences.description: Workspace API key on Dub. Learn more: https://d.to/tokens
